title: America-India is the AI power of the new world: PM Modi
description: Addressing the Indian diaspora at Nassau Coliseum in New York, Long Island at Modi & US Event, he said, "For the world, AI means artificial intelligence, but for me, AI also means American-Indian spirit. This is the new 'AI' power of the world."
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday (local time) highlighted the relationship between India and the US in terms of artificial intelligence and gave a new meaning to it, describing it as the America-India spirit.
cleaned_content: prime minister narendra modi on sunday local time highlighted the relationship between india and the us in terms of artificial intelligence and gave a new meaning to it describing it as the america india spirit
